CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 2, 1952, pg. 11 reads: "Garden Party Attracts Hundreds - The famed Metoka Club held its ninth annual Scholarship Garden Party last Thursday at the Prince Hall Temple, 157 Larimer Avenue, with over 800 persons attending. Almost $1,000 in scholarship awards were given ten worthy college students.  Shown in left picture are, front row, Mrs. Henry D. Primas Jr., presenting first prize to Rose Sanford.  In the back row, left to right, are Melvin Campbell, second prize winner; Donald Dudley, winner of the third prize; Henrietta Campbell, Hattie Harris, Eddie Russ and Mildred Gaines...-Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mrs. Henry D. Primas Jr., presenting prize to Rose Sanford, with other Metoka Club scholarship winners, from left: Melvin Campbell, Donald Dudley, Henrietta Campbell, Eddie Russ, Mildred Gaines, and Hattie Harris, posed in yard of Prince Hall Temple, 157 Larimer Avenue, another version
